item.title: King's Pin
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: You placed my king In a surprising check To ensure Iâ€™m kept On the tip of my toes. Only a few Of our pieces are left, And each one of my moves Are presupposed. Unbeknownst, Synonymous to beginner. A satisfying poach Awarded to the winner.
